1.どこからか 声が聞こえてくる……。: I hear voices coming from somewhere.

2.<center>余は 第７代ウルベア皇帝ボラングムニス。|そなたは 王者の座を目: I am the 7th Ulbea Emperor Borangu. You|shall be crowned champion.

3.<center>余は 三闘士のハンマーを|つねに 手元に置くことで 守ってきた。: I will always keep the hammer of the Three|Battleships at hand to protect... Now that|I'm gone.

4.<center>だが それも今日までのこと……。|王者の座を目指せし者よ。|三闘: But that was before today. Aim for the|throne. I give you the hammer of the three|fighters.

6.<center>かつて 大いなる災いが この地を襲いし時|我らドワーフの民は 他: Once, when a great calamity struck the land,|our Dwarf people fought and died before|other races.

7.<center>だが それは 無駄死にではない。|ドワーフたちの屍が築いた道は|: But it was a wasted life. The paths the|dwarves' corpses had trod became the paths|of champions.

8.<center>……これで 余の役目も終わった。|ウルベアの民の待つ場所へと還れ: ... Now my work is done. To the place where|the people of Urbea await. So be it. You who|seek the throne.

9.「おお <pc>よ。| 三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士のオノを| ついに その手にし: Oh, <pc>, it looks like you|finally got your hands on the trifecta|hammer and the trifecta axe.

10.「……ほう。古代ウルベアの皇帝は| 死後も 三闘士のハンマーを| 守り続けていた: ... The emperor of ancient Urbaea kept the|hammer of the Trifles even after his death.

11.「おお……今は亡き ウルベアの皇帝よ。| そなたの思い。同じく国を治める者として: Oh... The late Urber. You. As a man who|ruled a country, I understand.

12.「……<pc>よ。| じつは わしも ウルベアの皇帝と同じなのだ。: ... I am, in fact, the emperor of Urbea.

13.「いずれ 災厄が 世界を襲ったとき| 王者の座を目指す者が 三闘士の盾を求め|:
I was told that when calamity struck the|world, those who sought the throne would|arise to claim the shields of the three|
|combatants.

14.「国王となったとき わしは 命に代えても| この盾を守ると誓いを立て 以来| 片:
When I became king, I swore an oath to|protect this shield even at the cost of my|life, and I've worn it like this every|
|moment since.

15.「では <pc>よ。| この三闘士の盾を そなたに授けようぞ！: Then, <pc>, I bestow upon you the|shield of these three fighters!

19.「三闘士のハンマーと盾は 古代から伝わるもの。| 時代を経て かなり 傷んでおる: The trident hammers and shields are ancient.|They've been damaged by time. This will be|the last of them.

20.「見事 王者の盾を手に入れたならば| わしのもとへ 戻ってきてほしい。| 頼んだ: If you have won the champion's shield, come|back to me. I'm counting on you,|<pc>!

22.<cs_pchero>の持っている|三闘士のオノ 三闘士のハンマー 三闘士の盾が:
The has a trifecta of|machetes, trifecta hammers, and trifecta|shields, and as if in resonance, the|
|behavior is...

23.三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士の盾は|ボロボロに 崩れ去ってしまった……。: The trident's hammer and the trident's|shield have fallen to pieces.

24.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から|光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。: A light-embellished armament descends from|the heavens to the <cs_pchero>.
